author: mseidel42
body:
#### PR description:

* Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44603#issuecomment-2205161533 by adding dummy event weights if none are present (most likely for particle guns)
* Add test to avoid this problem in the future

#### PR validation:

```
% runTheMatrix.py -l 11601.0 --ibeos -t 4
...
1 1 1 1 1 tests passed, 0 0 0 0 0 failed
```
title: Fix HepMC3 conversion on MC without event weights (particle guns)
